idea-plugin.name: ChatGPTBaby
idea-plugin.description:
This is a ChatGPT tool plugin. You just need to input the API Key provided by OpenAI, and you can have a conversation with ChatGPT. As you can see, it is a baby, but it is growing rapidly.
plugin address：https://github.com/caijianying/ChatGPTBaby
